verbs.description: [ARG0: The president ’s lawyer] [V: says] [ARG1: Trump may have the constitutional authority to pardon himself] but says the political consequences would be extreme .

[ARG0: The president ’s lawyer] says Trump may have the constitutional authority to pardon himself but [V: says] [ARG1: the political consequences would be extreme] .
